name: Out of control virus (late)
description:
# The game

An out of control virus is affecting your system! You are sent into the computer to salvage files (platforms). Touch the files before they get fully corrupted and disappear to save the bytes!

Note: The game ends abruptly and you lose control of the character. It looks like a crash but is really just the end as I ran out of time.

# Warning

Warning the soundtrack is loud, please adjust your volume. I'm sorry :(

The game ends abruptly - this is not a crash just a representation of me running out of time.

## Controls

Direction: WASD/Arrow keys

Jump: Space 

Grab: Z/X/C
